attributes.action: enable the people of England to freely watch their national football team on terrestrial television as opposed to pay per view
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It was a national disgrace that as a nation we had to pay to watch our national football team on pay per view television. This petition aims to highlight national outcry, and hopefully make the Government sit up and think with a view to making our England team free to watch.
In words of Kitchener (1914 - 1916)"Your Country needs you!"...after all it is our national sport.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
